summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3394 for the improvement of The Alley between Blocks Three (3) and Four (4), Thirteen (130 and Fourteen (14), Nineteen (19), and Twenty (20), Northern Addition, being the alley between 8th Avenue West and 9th Avenue West, from Olympic Way to West Galer Street, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 42100, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
